p: The citrus waste used in this work was orange residue obtained from juice processing at the Brämhult factory (Borås, Sweden) and stored at −20 °C prior to use. The citrus waste was thawed and homogenized to obtain the citrus waste slurry. The characteristic of citrus waste used in this experiment are shown in Table 1. The d-limonene content of the citrus waste was analyzed using gas chromatography–mass spectrometry (GC-MS, Trace GC Ultra, ThemoScientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
